means: 使清爽，使有精神，把（自己）盥洗一番

sentence.Network_en: A thorough brushing helps to freshen up your mouth.
sentence.Network_cn: 彻底刷牙有助于口气清新。

sentence.Network_en: My room needed a lick of paint to freshen it up.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的房间只要刷一点油漆就能焕然一新。

sentence.Network_en: A coat of paint will freshen this room up.
sentence.Network_cn: 刷一层油漆会使房间焕然一新.

jx.jx_en_mean: revive oneself by washing oneself or changing into clean clothes
jx.jx_cn_mean: （洗过澡或换过干净衣服后）使自己恢复精力；使自己精神饱满

lj.lj_ly: he went off to freshen up in the local baths.
lj.lj_ls: 他去当地的澡堂洗澡，以振作精神。

entry.def: If the wind freshens, it becomes stronger and colder.
If you freshen something up, you make it clean and pleasant in appearance or smell.

example.ex: A thorough brushing helps to freshen up your mouth...
example.tran: 彻底刷牙有助于口气清新。

example.ex: My room needed a lick of paint to freshen it up.
example.tran: 我的房间只要刷一点油漆就能焕然一新。

entry.def: If you freshen up, you wash your hands and face and make yourself look neat and tidy.

example.ex: After Martine had freshened up, they went for a long walk.
example.tran: 马蒂娜梳洗完毕后，他们出去散了一个长步。

means.word_mean: 2. become or make oneself fresh again;

sentences.sentence: "She freshened up after the tennis game"

auth_sentence.content: Damariscotta is on a mission to freshen up its cafeteria menu.
auth_sentence.res_content: Damariscotta is on a mission to freshen up its cafeteria menu.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Damariscotta is on a mission to freshen up its cafeteria menu.

auth_sentence.content: Second, are there other ways you could freshen up your look?
auth_sentence.res_content: Second, are there other ways you could freshen up your look?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Second, are there other ways you could freshen up your look?

auth_sentence.content: Yummm.-When you freshen the look of a room with pain - add ceramic micro-spheres.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yummm.-When you freshen the look of a room with pain - add ceramic micro-spheres.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yummm.-When you freshen the look of a room with pain - add ceramic micro-spheres.

sentences.en: I will freshen your drink with more soda and ice cubes.
sentences.cn: 我给你的饮料重加一些苏打水和冰块。

sentences.en: She freshened up the room with some flowers.
sentences.cn: 她用一些花使房间鲜亮起来。

sentences.en: I’ll just freshen (myself) up before dinner.
sentences.cn: 晚饭前我要去梳洗打扮一番。

sentences.en: A coat of paint will freshen this room up.
sentences.cn: 刷一层油漆会使房间焕然一新。
